text: Artists at the iHeartRadio Music Awards took the stage Sunday night to talk about gun violence and the Marjory Stoneman Douglas shooting in Parkland, Florida that killed 17 people on February 14. Early in the show, host Hailey Baldwin took the stage with her co - host, DJ Khaled, in a shirt that said ` ` Stoneman Douglas High'' in the front and their mascot, the eagle, in the back with the slogan, ` ` Eagles soar higher.'' Getty Images Later on in the show, Big Sean introduced Stoneman Douglas student Alex Moscou. ` ` He's a lacrosse goalie, he's a member of the drama club and he's a sophomore who survived the attack by a gunman at Marjory Stoneman Douglas High School
